page.title: 12The Parish Council
page.content: Nine people are on the parish council which is elected every four years. They look after all the things that go in Stallingborough. This costs money which comes from the rates .The two main facilities the council provides are the playing field and the village hall.The village hall is used by different groups for their meetings. The parish council likes to promote pride in the village community and they publish a monthly newsletter about village activities.The council are pressing for a bypass to be built.They would like to stop lorries going through the village to reach the factories and make Stallingborough a quieter and safer place.There are plansto build a new housing estate but the council doesn't want a large estatebecause it might spoil the character of the village.
